thread.section_title: The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful
thread.title_full: Beautiful - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jap820
title: Beautiful
text:
Impeccable service, gorgeous architecture, friendly and accommodating hotel staff. Rooms were extremely clean! If u can't stay there, go just to check out the history and art of the hotel, it's beautiful.
My only issue was the waitstaff at the bar area, not friendly at all. They Could smile or even converse with your paying customers.
